title: .wad files
content:
Is there a program that can open and extract files out a .wad file ? Please I need to know this

EDIT : I need them to extract textures , sound , pic's , music , etc for games like doom , doom2 and strifeI am the bad you are the ugly There is no good

title: Re: .wad files
content:
There are heaps - [url=http://www.google.com.au/search?q=wad+editor]use Google.[/url]

I used to use WinTex when I was running Windows, but I'm sure there are far better editors/extractors out there by now.

EDIT: [url=http://www.gamers.org/addons/utils/deutex/]WinTex does all that[/url]

title: Re: .wad files
content:
Good ol Win Tex, its bigger than Texas!A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: .wad files
content: Yeah, i'd say WinTex is the best and easiest to use Doom wad editor. I once made a mod with it but it was over 43MB (I was still a n00bsie then) and I don't have a backup copy of it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] -- Censorship is F**ked! --
